title: Carnivore capers
creator_credit: Mark Laughlin, Tony Paice and Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development
brief_description: This program set in the Royal Melbourne Zoo looks at three types of carnivores - lions, cape hunting dogs and seals, and follows the keeper through a typical day.
creator_credit_for_label: Mark Laughlin, Tony Paice and Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development
